subject: Ssn2818
description_text: My Order # SSN2818 arrived today and the wrong shifter was sent..i ordered the 6+R and was shipped the 7+R. Is there a way this can be exchanged for the shifter ordered? Thank youBlake Humber903 590 0189

conversations.body_text: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our warehouse staff mistakenly shipped the wrong item. If you can accept this 7+R, we can issue a $20 refund. If not, we can arrange a replacement for you. We apologize for the trouble.

I would like the 6+r shifter please if that can be arranged...what would be the steps involved in an exchange of this one for the one I ordered?Thanks for the replyBlake Humber903 590 0189 
-------- Original message --------

Hi subafor2003,    Please check the shipping cost for returning item 6+r to this address. Our US warehouse is currently unable to generate return labels. We apologize for the inconvenience.  Chino1 Warehouse,  13402 Yorba Avenue, Unit 102,  Chino, CA 91710  USA

Id like to arrange for a replacement,  thank you. RespectfullyBlake Humber
-------- Original message --------

I will check the shipping and I will be shipping back the 7+r shifter that was sent to me instead of the 6+r I ordered... will my replacement 6 +r be shipped when this shifter is returned to the warehouse? ThanksBlake Humber 
-------- Original message --------
Hi subafor2003,    We will arrange shipment of the hexagonal gearshift today, so please don't worry.
Hi subafor2003,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=394835194520

Thank you, I will ship this shifter out tomorrow to the California warehouse. - Blake Humber 
-------- Original message --------
